name: Lungs Surgery Simulator 3D
description:
Your next game as a crazy surgeon! Do lungs surgery, care of your patient. Do anything you want!

Surgeon is on hurry, it's emergency, your patient is dying and you have to transplant new lungs. You have seconds to complete this crazy task, train yourself to be a top surgeon. But if you want to make fun you are not limited at all. Mix organs, remove extra ones and have fun with this Lungs Surgery Simulator 3D!

Try to experiment, remove or replace organs. Are you crazy enough? Be a crazy Surgeon.

Lungs Surgery Simulator 3D features:

Lots of crazy surgeries - mix or remove organs
Variety of instruments for surgeries
Realistic organs to perform surgeries
Be a crazy surgeon!

Join our crazy surgeons team with this Lungs Surgery Simulator 3D game! Use your crazy skill to perform the craziest surgery ever!
